game.name: BIGFOOT
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: You are a Bigfoot hunter with an important mission: to put an end to rumours once and for all and prove to yourself that Bigfoot is not just a myth or an invention of the mind...
game.shortDescriptionEn: You are a Bigfoot hunter with an important mission: to put an end to rumours once and for all and prove to yourself that Bigfoot is not just a myth or an invention of the mind...

reviewHighlights.text: Me and my friend used to watch people play this game on YouTube. After a bit of time when my friend first showed me the game, I started doing a little...
Mr. foot chased me across the map on multiple occasions. it was awesome. 10/10 game
